pullRequest.title: Custom Item integration with Piglins
pullRequest.bodyText: Allows custom items to be marked as "currency" for piglin, so that when they are given them they use their loot table and give something random back. This PR also allows marking an item when worn in an armor slot as an item that can "pacify" the piglin and keep them neutral while worn.

commit.message: Adds support for marking custom items as tradeable with piglins, and allowing custom armors to not anger piglins
Update method name from pacifiesPiglins to makesPiglinsNeutral and improve description in JavaDocs
